Stephen Williams , co-chair of the Liberal Democrat parliamentary treasury committee, said: This is evidence from the heart of Whitehall that Labour lost control of public spending and is yet another example that Ed Miliband doesn't know what he is talking about.`` The Labour leader is living in a fantasy-land where Labour never did anything wrong. Yet every day more evidence comes to light which shows that Gordon Brown 's spendthrift attitude was out of control and his financial management a shambles.
